objects.text:
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• High-Precision Electronic Viewfinder
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system with XF mount
• High-precision electronic viewfinder (EVF)
• Multiple manual control dials for professional shooting experience
• Robust metal body construction for durability
• Advanced autofocus system for precise focusing
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Film simulation modes for creative expression
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel
• Compatible with wide range of Fujinon XF lenses
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Enhanced grip design for comfortable handling
• Real-time exposure preview through EVF

banner_details:
This banner design features a modern and professional layout promoting a digital camera product. The background uses layered rectangles and soft gradient overlays in dark shades of gray and black, with semi-transparent red accent circles to add depth and visual interest. The "heading" text is bold and prominently placed at the top left in white, emphasizing the brand and model. Just below, the "tagline" text in red reinforces the promotional message. A list of features is clearly presented using bullet points under the "description" text layer. The pricing, shown using the "price" text layer, stands out in large white font. A vibrant red rectangular button labeled via "cta" text invites action, placed on top of the "cta_background" shape. The "product_image" displays a high-resolution camera render positioned to the right, balancing the overall layout visually.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black (#1A1A1A)
- Charcoal Gray (#232323)
- Crimson Red (#FF3B30)
- Soft White (#FFFFFF)
- Transparent Red (#FF0000 with opacity 0.15)
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera uses a sleek and professional color palette centered around deep black (#0D0D0D) for the camera body, contrasted with metallic grey (#4F4F4F) in the lens rings. White (#FFFFFF) is used for the Fujifilm and XT-10 branding and camera control markings, providing sharp readability. Highlights are added through reflective lens glass featuring subtle green-yellow hues (#B3BF56, #A0C49D) that add realism and depth. The overall blend creates a high-end, premium look. For an advertisement banner, pairing black and white with accent colors like metallic grey and soft green will reinforce the camera’s modern and sophisticated appeal.
